channel.title: CVE Feed for N Squared -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for N Squared -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-22311|2024-08-01T22:43:34.513Z -- n%20squared -- simply%20schedule%20appointments
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in N Squared Simply Schedule Appointments allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Simply Schedule Appointments: from n/a through 1.6.6.20.
